DOC.brief_summary: To study the impact of CPAP therapy on gait in patients with obstructive sleep apnea syndrome.
DOC.brief_title: To Study the Impact of CPAP on Gait Parameters in OSA Patients
DOC.detailed_description: To study the impact of CPAP therapy on gait velocity and temproral gait in patients with obstructive sleep apnea syndrome using the SMTEC system. Patients will be assessed before and 8 weeks after CPAP therapy.
DOC.criteria: OSA patients newly diagnosed acute medical illness in the past months neurological and psychiatric diseases orthopaedic, rheumatologic or any sensory conditions affecting normal walking
